content: Poisestone is lurking in the cave at Rockrest Flat. To find Poisestone, head into the cave directly opposite the Rockrest Flat Keeper's Shrine and turn right almost immediately upon entering. Follow that path around to find the Mother of all Stones guarded by the Poisestone and several other rock enemies.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Poisestone_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Poisestone Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Poisestone Location'.
The content is as follows:
Poisestone is lurking in the cave at Rockrest Flat. To find Poisestone, head into the cave directly opposite the Rockrest Flat Keeper's Shrine and turn right almost immediately upon entering. Follow that path around to find the Mother of all Stones guarded by the Poisestone and several other rock enemies.
